name: Andreid
description:
Get to the top of the tower, killing scary enemies, avoiding dangerous traps and finding secrets! Beat the five floors, each with an unique boss and thematic things!

Be the first to discover the very big secret and win our gratitude!

Even if it is just a little game, we made it with love and a lot of work, so please share it around! We hope you'll like it as i like you!

(report us any  bugs please)
